name: Dolphins-cyborgs and open space
description: Dolphins-cyborgs and open space - this is an exciting puzzle. Yes, the dolphins-cyborgs did an unexpected thing - they sent a spacecraft into space! In the game you will find many interesting levels of varying complexity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB Storage: 200 MB available space
